Talk_6000:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ms. Zelda still isn't back... <sp:5:1:0>Is it because she's
disappointed in me?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_6013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So...you have business at Ms. Zelda's
house too?<sp:0:4:0>You know she's not back home yet, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Right around the time of the Upheaval,
Ms. Zelda just stopped coming home.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>She always used to say, "See you later," whenever
she left the village, but not that time...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, but I don't want to be late for
class. If you have questions about our
village, have you tried asking my papa?<sp:0:4:0>He's the <clr:0000>mayor <clr:ffff>of this village, after all!
You'll probably find him at home.<sp:0:4:0>Just enter through the arch-shaped gate.
Talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can take shelter from the rain at my
house. I don't mind!
Talk_1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, but I don't want to be late for
class. If you have questions about our
village, have you tried asking my papa?<sp:0:4:0>He's the <clr:0000>mayor <clr:ffff>of this village, after all!
I think he could tell you whatever you
wanted to know.
Talk_1015: <sp:3:0:2:0700>If you need anything, try asking my papa!
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you have questions about our village,
why not ask the mayor? He should be
home at this hour.<sp:0:4:0>Just enter through the arch-shaped gate.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>Oh no! Class is starting soon. I need to
hurry or else I'll be late! Goodbye!
Talk_6003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>I'm keeping watch at Ms. Zelda's house
because I want to be the first one to
welcome her home when she gets back!
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Good morning to you, Mr. Link!
Nice weather we're having.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>Oh, but I can't fritter away my time talking
to you. Class is starting soon!
Talk_6017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You have business at Ms. Zelda's house
too, Mr. Link?<sp:0:4:0>You know she's not back home yet, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Right around the time of the Upheaval,
Ms. Zelda just stopped coming home.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>She always used to say, "See you later," whenever
she left the village, but not that time...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Mr. Link, I don't have the time to fritter
away talking! Class is starting soon!
Talk_6018:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Oh! Uhhh?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Mr. Link? Do you have business at
Ms. Zelda's house too?<sp:0:4:0>You know she's not back home yet, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Right around the time of the Upheaval,
Ms. Zelda just stopped coming home.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>She always used to say, "See you later," whenever
she left the village, but not that time...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Good morning, Mr. Link! Too bad about
the weather today.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>Not that I have time to stand around
talking about it. Class is starting soon!
Talk_6006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, but I can't talk. I'm in a hurry.
If you have questions about our village,
have you tried asking my papa?<sp:0:4:0>He's the <clr:0000>mayor <clr:ffff>of this village, after all!
You'll probably find him at home.<sp:0:4:0>Just enter through the arch-shaped gate.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>Oh! But I'd better get moving. I don't
want to keep Ms. Zelda waiting, in case
she's back home today. Goodbye!
Talk_1006:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I wonder if Ms. Zelda will be back at her home today.
Maybe I'll go check after class.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_6007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, but I can't talk. I'm in a hurry.
If you have questions about our village,
why not ask the mayor?<sp:0:4:0>He should be home at this hour. Just
enter through the arch-shaped gate.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>Oh! But I'd better get moving. I don't
want to keep Ms. Zelda waiting, in case
she's back home today. Goodbye!
Talk_7000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, but I'm in a hurry. If you have
questions about the village, you should
ask my papa.<sp:0:4:0>He's the <clr:0000>mayor <clr:ffff>of this village! He should
be at home right now. I'm headed there
as well.<sp:0:4:0>Do you want to come with me?
Talk_6008:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>Ms. Zelda might be back at her home by
now, so I need to go check! Goodbye!
Talk_6009:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM_00>Sorry, Mr. Link, but I can't talk right now.
I'm in a hurry. Can we pick this up later?<sp:0:4:0>Ms. Zelda might be back at her home by
now, so I need to go check! Goodbye!
Talk_7002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, Mr. Link, but I'm in a hurry. If you
have questions about the village, you
should ask my papa.<sp:0:4:0>He's the <clr:0000>mayor <clr:ffff>of this village! He should
be at home right now. I'm headed there
as well.<sp:0:4:0>Do you want to come with me?
Talk_7003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm headed home right now. Did you
want to come along?<sp:0:4:0>My papa is the <clr:0000>mayor <clr:ffff>of this village! He
should be home, so if you have questions
about the village, I bet he'll answer them!
Talk_7004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can take shelter from the rain at my
house if you want.
Talk_7005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sleep>Please come back... I've been
a good girl...
Talk_7006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't talk now. I need to get my sleep
for school tomorrow.<sp:0:4:0>If you have questions about the village,
you should ask my papa. He's the <clr:0000>mayor<clr:ffff>
of this village!
Talk_8000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The picture you brought in was
amazing, mister!<sp:0:4:0>You gotta tell Ms. Zelda the story of the
ancient hero when she gets back.
Talk_6010:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Oh! Uhhh?!<sp:0:4:0>Do you have business at Ms. Zelda's
house too, mister?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You know she's not back home yet, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Right around the time of the Upheaval,

Talk_8001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That curry you brought in was incredible,
Mr. Link!<sp:0:4:0>Can I have the recipe so I can make it for
Ms. Zelda when she comes back?
Talk_7008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't talk now. I need to get my sleep for
school tomorrow. If you have questions
about the village, ask my papa.
